data.text: @freebellabean17 @SenatorShaheen What on earth makes Shaheen a Nazi? You may disagree on policies but how is getting funding to help kids mental health in any way a bad thing? She works hard, is bipartisan and truly cares about humanity. Congrats you've triggered a lib!

@LarryWasham @SenatorShaheen @usedgov The pandemic was real. I lost family members to it. Still that doesn't mean common sense should be thrown out the window. Life is far too short for that. The virus isn't going anywhere. So it is past time that we get on with our lives.
@DavidStockyard @SenatorShaheen @usedgov @SenatorShaheen creates a crisis and deflects the blame, just like the fentanyl epidemic.
@SenatorShaheen @usedgov You are a Nazi, wear your swatzika...

@SenatorShaheen @usedgov Or maybe you let kids be kids, and stop isolating them. Or forcing them to wear masks to prevent a virus that is very unlikely to cause them any great harm. Instead we pump them full mind altering medicine. Then wonder why things aren't working out.
@SenatorShaheen @usedgov You Bidophiles are a primary cause for this. Masking BS, mandates, movement license coming next?
@SenatorShaheen @usedgov Hire more social workers too! And thank you!
